quote: Self-Help I asked the bookseller,'Do you have any self-help books for addiction?'He said,'If I tell you, I'd be enabling you.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I went to a bookstore and asked the saleswoman, 'Where's the self-help section?' She said if she told me, it would defeat the purpose.
author: George Carlin

quote: If the self-help books worked, it would be a shrinking industry not a growing one.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading; but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: As an author, I like self-help, because clapping can be done by myself, for myself. I should buy gloves.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Any book which inspires us to lead a better life is a good book.
author: Fulton J. Sheen,  The Quotable Fulton Sheen: A Topical Compilation of the Wit, Wisdom, and Satire of Archbishop Fulton J. Sheen

quote: I suggest that the only books that influence us are those for which we are ready, and which have gone a little further down our particular path than we have yet gone ourselves.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: Books open your mind, broaden your mind, and strengthen you as nothing else can.
author: William Feather

quote: When you desire to help, you will find a way to do it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: if a book isn't self-explanatory, then it isn't worth reading.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Zahir

quote: I usually give a book 40 pages. If it doesn't grab me by then, adios. With young adult books, you can usually tell by Page 4 if it's worth the time. The author establishes the conflict early, sometimes in the first sentence. The themes of hope, family, friendship and overcoming hardship appeal to most everyone.
author: Regina Brett

quote: What are a friend's books for if not to be borrowed?
author: Tom Stoppard,  Arcadia

quote: I would say I'm an inspirational guidelines book. You can take my life story or scenarios or songs and relate to them and apply them to your everyday life.
author: Chris Brown

quote: Don't just say you have read books. Show that through them you have learned to think better, to be a more discriminating and reflective person. Books are the training weights of the mind. They are very helpful, but it would be a bad mistake to suppose that one has made progress simply by having internalized their contents."Translation by Sharon Lebell
author: Epictetus,  The Art of Living: The Classical Manual on Virtue, Happiness and Effectiveness

quote: A book comes and says, 'Write me.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.
author: Jane Hamilton

quote: Books are for nothing but to inspire
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We need the books that affect us like a disaster, that grieve us deeply, like the death of someone we loved more than ourselves, like being banished into forests far from everyone, like a suicide. A book must be the axe for the frozen sea inside us.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: If I write a book where all I've ever experienced is success, people won't take a positive lesson from it. In being candid, I have to own up to my own failures, both in my marriage and in my work environment.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: And each book has to receive your best effort every single time. No slacking.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: The wonderful thing about books is that they allow us to enter imaginatively into someone else’s life. And when we do that, we learn to sympathize with other people. But the real surprise is that we also learn truths about ourselves, about our own lives, that somehow we hadn’t been able to see before.
author: Katherine Paterson

quote: Good books are about everything.
author: Andrew Smith,  Grasshopper Jungle

quote: This book taught me, once and for all, how easily you can escape this world with the help of words! You can find friends between the pages of a book, wonderful friends.
author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkspell

quote: That which others hear or read of, I felt and practised myself; they get their knowledge by books, I mine by melancholizing.
author: Robert Burton,  The Anatomy of Melancholy

quote: A good book ... leaves you wanting to reread the book. A great book compels you to reread your own soul.
author: Richard Flanagan,  The Narrow Road to the Deep North

quote: One always has a better book in one's mind than one can manage to get onto paper.
author: Michael Cunningham

quote: All the books we own, both read and unread, are the fullest expression of self we have at our disposal. ... But with each passing year, and with each whimsical purchase, our libraries become more and more able to articulate who we are, whether we read the books or not.
author: Nick Hornby,  The Polysyllabic Spree

quote: Teach a child not to seek help but to seek the opportunity to help others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I read the fuck out of every book I can get my hands on.
author: Nick Hornby,  A Long Way Down

quote: Book is book.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they'll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back.
author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines

quote: Books are the most wonderful friends in the world. When you meet them and pick them up, they are always ready to give you a few ideas. When you put them down, they never get mad; when you take them up again, they seem to enrich you all the more.
author: Fulton J. Sheen,  Life Is Worth Living

quote: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back.
author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines

quote: One reads for oneself and for strangers.
author: Harold Bloom,  The Western Canon: The Books and School of the Ages

quote: As you grow ready for it, somewhere or other you will find what is needful for you in a book.
author: George MacDonald,  The Marquis of Lossie

quote: It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A good book should leave you....slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading it.
author: William Styron

quote: Open a book this minute and start reading. Don’t move until you’ve reached page fifty. Until you’ve buried your thoughts in print. Cover yourself with words. Wash yourself away. Dissolve.
author: Carol Shields,  The Republic of Love

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell,  1984

quote: Never lend books, for no one ever returns them; the only books I have in my library are books that other folks have lent me.
author: Anatole France

quote: A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading.
author: William Styron,  Conversations with William Styron

quote: Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: We're all strangers connected by what we reveal, what we share, what we take away--our stories. I guess that's what I love about books--they are thin strands of humanity that tether us to one another for a small bit of time, that make us feel less alone or even more comfortable with our aloneness, if need be.
author: Libba Bray

quote: Write the book you want to read
author: Austin Kleon

quote: The real purpose of books is to trap the mind into doing its own thinking.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: I have all the books I could need, and what more could I need than books?
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  The Girl Who Ruled Fairyland - For a Little While

quote: It's a good idea to have your own books with you in a strange place
author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkheart

quote: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.
author: Amy Sedaris
